title: May: First Moves
description: Practice early campaign decisions and demonstrate strategic thinking in budgeting, outreach, and planning.

tasks.prompt: Choose one strategic path (Fundraising, Volunteers, or Media/Advertising) and write a detailed implementation plan.
Spend Candidate Coins (CC) from the Candidate Coin Store to simulate startup infrastructure or advertising costs.

narrator: It’s early summer — time to make your first strategic campaign decisions. You must decide how to allocate your limited CC between advertising, travel, and press outreach.
readingSummary: Early summer sets the tone for the campaign. Balance limited CC with building visibility and infrastructure.
Fundraising strategy involves setting goals, methods, and tracking progress.
Volunteer base requires recruitment, engagement, and retention planning.
Media & Advertising Plan requires a cost-benefit analysis for social media, digital ads, local press, and TV.
Candidate Coin Store represents campaign infrastructure and advertising costs.

tasksDetails.prompt: Write your strategic plan for the first month of campaigning.
Simulate spending CC from the Candidate Coin Store on startup infrastructure or advertising.

sources: General Election First Moves – Test Mode
FEC Getting Started Manual for Candidates

outcome.description: Updated CC balance, adjusted voter approval and signatures, and established initial campaign infrastructure.
